H0.text: Wood chips are objects that will rust.

H1.text: Plastic straws are objects that will rust.

A4.text: Rust is an iron oxide, a usually reddish-brown oxide formed by the reaction of iron and oxygen in the catalytic presence of water or air moisture.

A5.text: Rusting is the common term for corrosion of elemental iron and its alloys such as steel.
